casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bobby Daryl McGIRT. No. 390P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Bobby Daryl McGirt, Pro Se. Michael Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 27th day of October 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Lee County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
